data.title: Praguefrank's Country Discography 2: Connie Francis, part 2
data.meta_description: 3rd version by Richard Weize, Michel Ruppli, Praguefrank, Kittra Moore, Carl G. Cederblad, Bill Daniels, Thieu Van De Vorst, Larry Davis AL...
data.text:
3rd version

by Richard Weize, Michel Ruppli, Praguefrank, Kittra Moore, Carl G. Cederblad, Bill Daniels, Thieu Van De Vorst, Larry Davis

ALBUMS

MGM E-3686 Who's Sorry Now?: Who's Sorry Now; I'm Beginning To See The Light; I Cried For You; You Always Hurt The One You Love; I'll Get By; Heartaches; I'm Nobody's Baby; My Melancholy Baby; I Miss You So; It's The Talk Of The Town; If I Had You; How Deep Is The Ocean (How High Is The Sky) – 05-58
